sentences.sentence: Main products are round log handle of besom, mopstick, shank of tool, handle of beach parasol as well as processing a wide range of wooden craftwork materials.
sentences.translation: 主要产品有圆木柄、扫把柄、工具柄、沙滩伞柄以及加工各种木制工艺品材料。

sentences.sentence: The sounding board was made of Chinese parasol wood firmiana simplex, its rounded shape symbolising the heavens.
sentences.translation: 音板是由梧桐木做成的，其圆圆的形状象征着天空。
我买了一把漂亮的阳伞。
